title: Complete AI Tool Implementation with Full Mock Data and Backend Integration

requirements.summary: Implement complete mock AI functions for all 50+ job types with realistic placeholder data in aiService.ts
acceptanceCriteria: Mock functions for all 50+ job types implemented
Each mock returns structured data matching expected format
Data includes realistic values (URLs, scores, timestamps)
Mock responses simulate processing delay (500-2000ms)
All mocks return consistent data shapes

file_operations.description: Implement complete mock functions for all 50+ AI job types including mockVoiceClone (returning audioUrl, voiceId, sampleRate), mockMusicGenerate (audioUrl, duration, bpm, waveform array), mockBRollGenerate (videoUrl, scenes array with timing and descriptions), mockLogoGenerate (logos array with variants), mockStickerGenerate (imageUrl, transparent flag), mockCharacterGenerate (images array with poses, consistency score), and similar structured responses for all remaining 43+ job types. Each mock should return realistic placeholder data with simulated processing delays between 500-2000ms using setTimeout/Promise patterns.

requirements.summary: Add API integration points for all external AI providers with error handling and retry logic
acceptanceCriteria: Configuration objects for all 6+ AI providers
Request handlers for each provider implemented
Error handling with descriptive messages
Retry logic with exponential backoff (3 attempts)
30-second timeout for all API calls

file_operations.description: Add API integration configuration objects for elevenlabsConfig (apiKey, voiceId, stability, similarity), replicateConfig (apiKey, models for image/video), runwayConfig (apiKey, projectId), huggingfaceConfig (apiKey, models record), openaiConfig (apiKey, model, temperature), and provider-specific request handlers. Implement error handling with descriptive messages, retry logic with exponential backoff (3 attempts), and 30-second timeout handling for all API calls using fetch with AbortController.

requirements.summary: Update useAIJob hook to implement comprehensive job lifecycle management for all 50+ job types with automatic asset and timeline integration
acceptanceCriteria: submitAIJob handles all 50+ job types
Status polling checks every 2 seconds until completion
Results retrieved automatically on completion
Generation AI results added to asset library
Editing/Creator AI results integrated into timeline
Category-specific notifications with appropriate actions

file_operations.description: Implement comprehensive job lifecycle management with submitAIJob function using React Query mutation calling backend submitJob method, status polling using React Query with configurable 2-second interval checking job status via getJobStatus until 'completed' or 'failed', result retrieval calling backend getJobResults when status is 'completed'. Add automatic asset integration for Generation AI jobs (image.generate, video.generate, voice.clone, music.generate, broll.generate, logo.generate, sticker.generate, character.generate) that adds results to asset library with metadata. Add automatic timeline integration for Editing/Creator AI jobs that creates new clips/layers with proper timing and transforms. Implement category-specific success notifications using toast with action buttons (View in Assets, View on Timeline, Apply Changes, Download) based on job type category.

requirements.summary: Update AIAssistant component to add command interface panel with quick commands, autocomplete, and command history
acceptanceCriteria: 10 quick command buttons with glassmorphism styling
Autocomplete shows matching commands as user types
Command history displays last 20 commands
Commands map to appropriate AI jobs
Context automatically inferred from editor state

file_operations.description: Add command interface panel with quick command buttons section displaying 10 glassmorphism-styled buttons ('Make this cinematic', 'Fix color and audio', 'Turn into viral reel', 'Optimize for YouTube', 'Add motion blur', 'Balance exposure', 'Remove background noise', 'Add dynamic transitions', 'Enhance faces', 'Generate captions'). Add command input field with autocomplete dropdown that shows matching commands from aiKnowledgeBase as user types using fuzzy matching. Add command history panel showing last 20 executed commands with timestamps and result summaries stored in localStorage. Implement command execution handler that maps commands to appropriate AI job submissions (command.cinematic, command.fixColorAudio, command.viralReel) with automatic parameter inference from editor context using editorStore (selected clips, project settings).

requirements.summary: Update AIJobStatus component to support all 50+ job types with category filtering and color-coded progress
acceptanceCriteria: jobTypeMapping covers all 50+ job types
Category filter dropdown functional
Progress bars color-coded by category
Expanded details show formatted job configuration
Status updates refresh every 2 seconds

file_operations.description: Add jobTypeMapping object defining icon, label, and category for all 50+ job types. Add category filter dropdown allowing users to filter by AI category (All, Generation, Editing, Enhancement, Creator, Assistant, Growth, Experimental) using state management. Implement color-coded progress bars using category-specific colors (Generation: purple, Editing: blue, Enhancement: green, Creator: orange, Assistant: cyan, Growth: pink, Experimental: red) applied via Tailwind classes. Add expanded job details panel that shows job configuration parameters and payload data in formatted JSON using JSON.stringify with pretty printing. Ensure real-time status updates using React Query with 2-second refetchInterval for active jobs.

requirements.summary: Update Home page to display all 50+ AI tools organized by 8 expandable categories with responsive grid layout
acceptanceCriteria: All 8 AI categories displayed with tools
Category headers show icon, name, and count
Expand/collapse functionality works smoothly
Responsive grid adapts to screen size
Category colors match established theme

file_operations.description: Update to display all 50+ AI tools organized by 8 categories (Generation AI with 8 tools, Editing AI with 3 tools, Enhancement AI with 7 tools, Creator AI with 8 tools, Assistant AI with 2 tools, Growth AI with 7 tools, Experimental AI with 8 tools, System AI with backend features note) as expandable/collapsible category sections. Add category headers showing category icon, name, tool count badge, and expand/collapse chevron icon. Implement category content as responsive grid (grid-cols-4 gap-6 on desktop, grid-cols-2 gap-4 on mobile) of AIToolCard components. Apply category-specific color themes matching established OKLCH palette. Manage expand/collapse state with React useState and add smooth height transitions using CSS transition classes.

Expand AI tool categories data structure to include all 50+ tools organized across 8 categories with complete metadata (name, description, route, icon, category) for each tool. Ensure all tools from aiJob.ts types are represented with consistent naming and routing paths.
